summary.name: FUJIFILM Instax Mini 11
summary.description: The aim of this manifest is to document the journey of the supply chain involved in the production and distribution of the FUJIFILM Instax Mini 11 camera.

overview.name: Disc
overview.description: Solid state, non volatile. The film is in the form of a flat disc, and is fully housed within a plastic cartridge. The disc film allows them to be compact and considerably thinner than other cameras

overview.name: Dyes, pigments, paints
overview.description: A node in Singapore that supplies synthetic coloring matter needed for the dyes, pigments and paints used to color the cameras

overview.name: Printing Ink
overview.description: Whether or not concentrated or solid; Black

location.address: Rinchem Israel, Industrial Area Ne Ot Hovav Be Er Sheva 8551600 Israel

overview.name: Hydrofluoric Acid Solution
overview.description: A node in Isreal that supplies Hydrofluoric acid solutions to Fujifilm for use as dilute hydrofuoric acid etchants for glass etching

location.address: Rinchem Israel, Industrial Area Ne Ot Hovav Be Er Sheva 8551600 Israel

overview.name: Butyl Acetate
overview.description: A clear, colorless liquid with a fruity odor that is used in photographic film

location.address: 1600 Bellwood Rd, North Chesterfield, Va 23237, Us

overview.name: Gal Steel Cannister
overview.description: These are light-tight containers used to enclose film stock. Typically a circular box pressed from thin sheet metal, but plastic examples are also used. Film cans are used to hold unexposed film or exposed film

location.address: No.206 Longtan Road, SIP, Suzhou 215021, China

overview.name: Film
overview.description: Fujifilm Elctronic Materials Korea supplies film to Fujifilm Electronic Materials in Mesa, AZ; This is Fujifilm's largest facility in the U.S.

location.address:
Fujifilm Electronic Materials Korea, 4Th Jinsung B D 944-25 Daechi-Don G Seoul 135-280 Kr
Republic Of Korea

overview.name: hexamethyldisilazane
overview.description: A solvent commonly used in photolithography, which is a process used in semiconductor chips/ circuit board manufacturing which uses light to produce thin films that cover the substrates in the circuit board

location.address:
Fujifilm Electronic Materials Singapore, #05-01 Sunshine Plaza Singapore 18 9652 Sg
Singapore

overview.name: Interleaf Paper
overview.description: Fuji Xerox in japan supplies Interleaf paper to Fujifilm North America (Greenwood, SC). Interleaf paper is the thin covering used to protect the photographs produced from fujifilm polaroid cameras

location.address:
Fuji Xerox, 26-30 Nishiazabu 2-Chome Minato-Ku Tokyo 106-8620 Japan
Japan

overview.name: Anionic Surfactant (LAS)
overview.description: These are contaminated from factory wastewater and domestic sewage are considered to be an important indicator of water pollution because they cause foaming when present in water. Fujifilm Wako provides various standard solutions for anionic surfactants

location.address:
Shin-Yokohama Tech Building 3-9-18 Shin-Yokohama Yokohama 14 222-0033
Japan

overview.name: Metal Core PCBs (Printed circuit boards)
overview.description: Fujifilm Manufacturing Shenzhen manufactures and supplies metal core PCBs to Xerox in the U.S. which is one of Fujifilm's partners

location.address: Fujifilm Manufacturing Shenzhen Cor No, 5802 Longhua Blvd Guanhu Longhua District

overview.name: Tetraethyl Orthosilicate
overview.description: A crosslinking agent in silicone polymers and as a precursor to silicon dioxide in the semiconductor industry

overview.name: Best Buy
overview.description: This Best Buy is a nearby retail location for the FUJIFILM Instax mini 11

overview.name: Urban Outfitters
overview.description: This Urban Outfitters is a nearby retail location for the FUJIFILM Instax mini 11

overview.name: Fujifilm Electronic Materials
overview.description: This is one of the manufacturing facilities for Fujifilm Electronic Materials U.S.A, inc. (a marketing subsidary of Tokyo- based Fukifilm Holdings) located in Mesa Az. This location recieves film from the Fujifilm Electronic Materials location in Korea.

location.address: 6550 S Mountain Rd, Mesa, Az 85212, Us

overview.name: Fujifilm Electronic Materials
overview.description: This is one of the facilities for Fujifilm Electronic Materials U.S.A, inc. (a marketing subsidary of Tokyo- based Fukifilm Holdings) located in Rhode Island. Supplier of advanced technology, chemistry and delivery equipment to the semiconductor and flat panel display fabrication market.

location.address: 80 Circuit Drive, North Kingstown, Rhode Island 02852

overview.name: Fujifilm North America Corporation: Imaging Division
overview.description: This location operates under Fujifilm North America's Imaging Division which provides consumer and commercial photographic products and services, including: photographic paper; digital printing equipment, along with service and support; personalized photo products; film; and one-time-use cameras

location.address: 200 Summit Lake Drive, Valhalla, NY 10595-1356, U.S.A.
